title: 3 DIY beauty recipes you didn’t know you could make in your blender
text:
3 DIY beauty recipes you didn’t know you could make in your blender originally appeared on goodmorningamerica.com

Did you know you could make beauty products using just a blender?

You can give yourself a spa day with an avocado-banana mask, a green tea and cucumber toning mist and body sugar scrub.

These DIYS are perfect for treating yourself or making with all of your friends.

Avocado-banana mask

PHOTO: Avocado and banana with the NutriBullet Pro 900. (ABC News) More

Does your skin feel a bit dry?

You can give it some TLC with an ultra-moisturizing face mask that's made with three naturally hydrating ingredients: grape seed oil, banana and avocado.

For this DIY, simply blend together 1/2 banana, 1/2 avocado and 1/2 cup grapeseed oil.

To blend, we used the brand-new NutriBullet Pro 900 – Colorway Series, but any blender will work, too.

Apply the mixture to clean skin and wait for 15 minutes.

Rinse of with warm water to reveal hydrated skin.

(MORE: 6 travel enthusiasts break down their in-flight beauty routine.)

Green tea and cucumber toning mist

PHOTO: Making green tea and cucumber toning mist. (ABC News) More

Green tea is thought to offer skin protection and anti-aging benefits due to its antioxidant capacity, and apple cider vinegar offers potential antibacterial benefits. Combine both with cooling and hydrating cucumber in this three-ingredient face mist.

Blend together 1/2 peeled cucumber, 2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar and 1/2 cup cold green tea.

Stick the blended ingredients in a spray bottle and carry with you wherever you go.

(MORE: Give yourself a champagne shower every day with these bubbly inspired hair products.)

Body sugar scrub

PHOTO: Using a body sugar scrub made with greek yogurt. (ABC News) More

Exfoliate the dead skin away with this homemade body scrub, which is especially cute when given as a gift, with contents simply put in a mason jar and wrapped with a ribbon.

Blend together 2 tablespoons lemon juice with 1/2 cup plain Greek yogurt.

After the lemon juice and yogurt are blended, stir in 2 cups of brown sugar.

Rub this sugar scrub all over your body to exfoliate and rinse off.

Recipes provided by NutriBullet.
